page.name: page
page.description: page which page list you want

type.name: type
type.description: type which type list you want, type value must taken from type list api

name.name: name
name.description: name which name list you want

search_date_type.name: search_date_type
search_date_type.description: search_date_type which date you want to search. valid values are created_date/last_login_date. if you put date then it is mandatary

start_date.name: start_date
start_date.description: start_date which date list you want, put the date in Y-m-d format

end_date.name: end_date
end_date.description: end_date which date list you want, , put the date in Y-m-d format

sort_order.name: sort_order
sort_order.description: sort_order which sort_order list you want

sort_by.name: sort_by
sort_by.description: sort_by which sort_by list you want
